thruputs

A spinner

Start or stop a spinner based on process progress.

Arguments

id

A character specifying the id of the spinner output.

type

One of "circle", "cog", "dots", or "sync" specifying the type of spinner, defaults to "circle".

pulse

One of TRUE or FALSE, if TRUE the spinner rotates in 8 discrete steps, defaults to FALSE.

...

Additional named argument passed as HTML attributes to the parent element.

session

A reactive context, defaults to getDefaultReactiveDomain()).html).
